name: Simply the Best
description: highest average score

name: WIP
description: lowest average score

name: MVP
description: highest average score when winning

name: Drama Queen
description: lowest average score when losing

name: It Could Have Been Glorious
description: highest average score when losing

name: I won... But at What Cost?
description: lowest average score when winning

name: Never a Dull Day
description: largest standard deviation in winning games

name: Ol' Reliable
description: smallest standard deviation in winning games
condition: std_dev_win_score = (SELECT MIN(std_dev_win_score) FROM spirit_game_data_agg WHERE win_rate != 0)

name: Spirit in a China Shop
description: largest standard deviation in losing games

name: Gonna Need a Better Plan
description: smallest standard deviation in losing games
condition: std_dev_loss_score = (SELECT MIN(std_dev_loss_score) FROM spirit_game_data_agg WHERE loss_rate != 0)

name: Great When it Happens
description: lowest win-rate : win-score ratio
condition: win_rate_to_win_score_ratio = (SELECT MIN(win_rate_to_win_score_ratio) FROM spirit_game_data_agg WHERE win_rate != 0)

name: Gets the Job Done
description: highest win-rate : win-score ratio

name: Lesser Spirit
description: highest loss-rate : loss-score ratio

name: Wasn't Even Worried
description: lowest loss-rate : loss-score ratio
condition: loss_rate_to_loss_score_ratio = (SELECT MIN(loss_rate_to_loss_score_ratio) FROM spirit_game_data_agg WHERE loss_rate != 0)

name: People Person
description: highest avg dahan on island at endgame

name: Anti-social
description: lowest avg dahan on island at endgame

name: Clean Freak
description: highest avg blight on island at endgame

name: Messy Eater
description: lowest avg blight on island at endgame

name: Got Places to Be
description: highest average number of invader cards remaining at endgame (when winning)

name: No Rush
description: lowest average number of invader cards remaining at endgame (when winning)
condition: avg_win_cards = (SELECT MIN(avg_win_cards) FROM spirit_game_data_agg WHERE win_rate != 0)

name: Hanging In There
description: highest average number of invader cards revealed at endgame (when losing)

name: At Least it Was Quick
description: lowest average number of invader cards revealed at endgame (when losing)
condition: avg_loss_cards = (SELECT MIN(avg_loss_cards) FROM spirit_game_data_agg WHERE loss_rate != 0)

name: Introverted
description: highest ratio of solo games

name: Extroverted
description: lowest ratio of solo games

name: Life of the Party
description: highest avg number of spirits in games

name: Closed Circle
description: lowest avg number of spirits in games

name: Team Player
description: highest ratio of non-solo score to solo score
condition: team_bias = (SELECT MAX(team_bias) FROM spirit_game_data_agg WHERE min_no_of_spirits = 1)

name: Better Off Alone
description: highest ratio of solo score to non-solo score
condition: team_bias = (SELECT MIN(team_bias) FROM spirit_game_data_agg WHERE min_no_of_spirits = 1)

name: Confident
description: highest average difficulty

name: Timid
description: lowest average difficulty
